wobani.components.light

Class BlinnPhongLightComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.core.Component
      • wobani.components.light.BlinnPhongLightComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentBase, Invalidatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlinnPhongDirectionalLightComponent, BlinnPhongPointLightComponent, BlinnPhongSpotLightComponent

    public abstract class BlinnPhongLightComponent
extends Component
    This abstract class stores the light's diffuse, specular and ambient components.
    See Also:
    GameObject

        public void setDiffuseColor(@NotNull

        Throws:
